title: Data file
description: Schema for submitting metadata for a data file.
comment: This object type is abstract. These properties are inherited by other object types

items.title: Alternate Accession
items.description: An accession previously assigned to an object that has been merged with this object.
items.comment: Only accessions of objects that have status equal replaced will work here.

external_accession.title: External accession
external_accession.description: For files that were not accessioned at our site but have an accession elsewhere.
external_accession.comment: Do not submit. Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.

file_format.title: File format
file_format.description: The format structure of the file.

no_file_available.title: No file available
no_file_available.description: A flag to indicate whether this file is available to download. It may also not exist if it is the result of an unproductive analysis.
no_file_available.comment: Do not submit. This value can only be set by admins.

submitted_file_name.title: Original file name
submitted_file_name.description: The local file name used at time of submission.
submitted_file_name.comment: Although this is not required. It is highly recommended.

md5sum.title: MD5sum
md5sum.description: The md5sum of the file being transferred.
md5sum.comment: Required for files with no_file_available = false . Warning: This value can vary for files of same content gzipped at different times

content_md5sum.title: Content MD5sum
content_md5sum.description: The MD5sum of the uncompressed file.
content_md5sum.comment: Do not submit. This is only relavant for gzipped files. This value is calculated and posted by checkfiles script upon submission.

output_types.title: Output types
output_types.description: A description of the file's purpose or contents.

supersedes.title: Supersedes
supersedes.description: The files that this file supersedes.
supersedes.comment: The files in this list should be obsolete and the superseeding file object should be used instead.

items.title: Supersedes
items.description: A file that this file supersedes
items.comment: The files in this list should be archived or revoked.

dataset.title: Dataset
dataset.description: The experiment or dataset the file belongs to.
dataset.comment: Required. See dataset.json for available identifiers.

derived_from.title: Derived from
derived_from.description: The files participating as inputs into software to produce this output file.

analysis_step.title: Analysis step run
analysis_step.description: The run instance of the step used to generate the file.
analysis_step.comment: This may be linked to an individual instance at DNANexus or it may be virtual and have many files linked to it.

content_error_detail.title: Content error detail
content_error_detail.description: Explanation of why the file failed the automated content checks.
content_error_detail.comment: Do not submit.  This is posted by the checkfiles script. It is required when status is 'content error'

revoke_detail.title: Revoke error detail
revoke_detail.description: Explanation of why the file was revoked.
revoke_detail.comment: Do not submit. The field would be posted by DCC.
